summary: Ipswich Town F.C. is a professional soccer team from Ipswich, England. They play in the Premier League, the highest level in English soccer. The club was founded in 1878 and joined the Football League in 1938. They've won the league title, FA Cup, and UEFA Cup. Ipswich has a strong record in European games, beating famous teams like Real Madrid. They play at Portman Road and have a big rivalry with Norwich City. Their home kit is blue shirts, white shorts, and blue socks.
title: Ipswich Town F.C.
